summary: Completed comprehensive testing of User-Created Tasks feature in Task Manager. All backend APIs (15/15 tests) and frontend UI features working correctly. Feature allows creating manual tasks with pipeline stage selection, task templates, investor linking, priority, and due dates.

issues: Minor: Missing aria-describedby for DialogContent (accessibility warning in console)

passed_tests: GET /api/task-templates returns templates for all 12 pipeline stages
Task templates contain valid content (Send intro email, Schedule phone call, etc.)
POST /api/funds/{fund_id}/user-tasks creates task with all fields
POST /api/funds/{fund_id}/user-tasks creates task with minimal fields (title, stage)
POST /api/funds/{fund_id}/user-tasks creates task linked to investor
POST /api/funds/{fund_id}/user-tasks returns 404 for invalid fund
GET /api/funds/{fund_id}/user-tasks returns only user-created tasks
GET /api/funds/{fund_id}/all-tasks returns combined system + user tasks
GET /api/funds/{fund_id}/all-tasks sorts tasks correctly (overdue first, then priority)
PUT /api/user-tasks/{task_id}/complete marks task as completed
Completing task reduces total count in all-tasks endpoint
PUT /api/user-tasks/{task_id}/complete returns 404 for non-existent task
DELETE /api/user-tasks/{task_id} deletes user task
DELETE /api/user-tasks/{task_id} returns 404 for non-existent task
PUT /api/user-tasks/{task_id} updates task fields
Create Task dialog opens with pipeline stage dropdown showing all 12 stages with color indicators
Selecting a stage shows task template dropdown for that stage
Create Task form validates required fields (title, stage) - submit disabled until valid
Task list displays both system and user tasks with correct styling
User tasks show stage-colored left border, 'Manual' badge, complete/delete buttons
System tasks show 'System' badge and only Fix button
Bell icon shows combined count of system + user tasks
Tab badge shows same count as bell icon
Completing a user task removes it from active count
Deleting a user task removes it from list and updates count
Fix button navigates to Investor Profiles tab with investor selected in edit mode
critical_code_review_comments: TaskManager.jsx well-structured with CreateTaskDialog component properly separated
Backend correctly implements all CRUD operations for user tasks
Task templates organized by pipeline stage - good UX for task creation
Combined all-tasks endpoint properly merges and sorts system + user tasks
Bell icon and tab badge correctly sync with total task count
Stage colors properly inherited from Kanban lane colors for visual consistency
